Castle in the Sky

Rank: 573


Pazu's life changes when he meets Sheeta- a girl whom pirates are chasing for her crystal amulet- which has the potential to locate Laputa- a legendary castle floating in the sky.


Director: Hayao Miyazaki

Writer: Hayao Miyazaki, Jonathan Swift

Stars: Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui

Tags: Anime, Hand,Drawn Animation, Quest, Adventure, Animation, Family, Fantasy
